body.ab: I am directed by the President to say that this paper must be regarded as directed to you also.
Wm. N. Grover, Esq. St Louis, Mo.
The preceding is a true copy of the paper, & also of the Atty. Genl's letter, which was this day forwarded by direction of the Att'y Gen'l to the U. S. Att'y, for the Eastern Dist Mo.
